ConsumableInstance.Name: Minor Healing Potion
ConsumableInstance.ItemDescription: Drinking will restore your health slightly.

ConsumableInstance.Name: Healing Potion
ConsumableInstance.ItemDescription: Drinking will restore your some of your health.

ConsumableInstance.Name: Major Healing Potion
ConsumableInstance.ItemDescription: Drinking will restore your health greatly.

ConsumableInstance.Name: Minor Mana Potion
ConsumableInstance.ItemDescription: Drinking will increase your mana somewhat.

ConsumableInstance.Name: Mana Potion
ConsumableInstance.ItemDescription: Drinking will increase your mana greatly.

ConsumableInstance.Name: Potion of Regeneration
ConsumableInstance.ItemDescription: Drinking this potion will allow natual healing to mend even serious phyical injury.

ConsumableInstance.Name: Scroll of Blinking
ConsumableInstance.ItemDescription: Reading this scroll will shunt your body to the ether plane for a few moments, moving you slightly from your current location.

ConsumableInstance.Name: Scroll of Teleportation
ConsumableInstance.ItemDescription: Reading this scroll will warp space around you, moving you to a new random location instantly.

ConsumableInstance.Name: Scroll of Slow
ConsumableInstance.ItemDescription: Reading this scroll will warp time around one enemy, slowing the passge of time for a short while.

ConsumableInstance.Name: Scroll of Haste
ConsumableInstance.ItemDescription: Reading this scroll will warp time around you for a short period of time, speeding your actions.

ConsumableInstance.Name: Armor of Light Invocation
ConsumableInstance.ItemDescription: Invoking this will clothe the invoker with a thin halo of light, toughening them against physical harm.

ConsumableInstance.Name: Word of Hope Invocation
ConsumableInstance.ItemDescription: Invoking this will raise the moral of those even in the most dire of circumstances, allowing them to draw upon hidden reserves of strength.

ConsumableInstance.Name: Wand Of Force Bolt
ConsumableInstance.ItemDescription: Zapping produces two tiny bolts of force striking a nearby target.

ConsumableInstance.Name: Wand Of Arcane Blast
ConsumableInstance.ItemDescription: Zapping it creates a ripple in space, sending a shockwave in a direction.

ConsumableInstance.Name: Wand Of Inferno
ConsumableInstance.ItemDescription: This wand produces a stream of fire with the slightest tap.

ConsumableInstance.Name: Wand Of Sparks
ConsumableInstance.ItemDescription: Zapping produces a shower of sparks striking a nearby targets.

ConsumableInstance.Name: Wand Of Fireball
ConsumableInstance.ItemDescription: Zapping this wand will create a tiny bead of fire that will explode into a fireball when it impacts a surface.
